content.query:
-- creating a dimension, School  
CREATE TABLE dimSchool(
    school_id INT,
    full_name VARCHAR(200),
    display_name VARCHAR(199),
    school_type VARCHAR(20),
    state VARCHAR(20),
    school_website VARCHAR(50)
);

-- Loading into dimSchool from the Data Lake Gen 2 File System 
COPY INTO dbo.dimSchool
FROM 'https://fgcdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/fgcgen2filesystem/All FGCs in Nigeria - Silver Layer.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    FIRSTROW = 2,  -- Skips header row
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
);

SELECT * FROM dimSchool
